price: Hakikingi moto, wala hakiwaepushi na mwako.
arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
footnotes: Hapana cha kujikinga na joto la siku hiyo, wala kivuli hicho hakipunguzi joto la mwako hata kidogo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā ẓalīlin walā yugh'nī mina al-lahabi
